content: प्रदुष् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To grow worse, deteriorate. {@--2@} To be corrupted or spoiled, be vitiated; <ls>Y. 3. 19.</ls> {@--3@} To sin, err, commit an offence against, be faithless or unchaste; <ls>Bg. 1. 41</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 74</ls>; <ls>Pt. 4. 57.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} ({%a%}) To spoil, corrupt, soil, taint. ({%b%}) To pollute, contaminate, defile. {@--2@} To blame, censure, find fault with.
